'''Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje''' (born 22 August 1967) is an English actor. He is best known for his roles in television, such as ''Lost'' and ''Oz'', and has appeared in films such as ''The Mummy Returns'', ''The Bourne Identity'' and ''Thor: The Dark World''. Interestingly, he has previously co-starred with ''Game of Thrones'' actors [[Jason Momoa]] ([[Khal Drogo]]) and [[Kit Harington]] ([[Jon Snow]]) in ''Bullet to the Head'' and ''Pompeii'', respectively.

In [[Season 5]] he will portray [[Malko]], a character invented for the television series.<ref>[http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/10/17/losts-adewale-akinnuoye-agbaje-joins-game-of-thrones]</ref>
